config.neo4j.topic.cypher.mirea.public.plan: WITH event WHERE event.op = 'c' MERGE (p:Plan {id: event.after.id}) ON CREATE SET p.semestr = event.after.semestr, p.year = event.after.year, p.hours = event.after.hours, p.spec = event.after.spec, p.discipline_id = event.after.discipline_id ON MATCH SET p.semestr = event.after.semestr, p.year = event.after.year, p.hours = event.after.hours, p.spec = event.after.spec, p.discipline_id = event.after.discipline_id WITH p, event MATCH (d:Discipline {id: p.discipline_id}) MERGE (d)-[:HAS_PLAN]->(p)
